MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 1.51pm in the LL23 postcode area of Bala following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to site and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.08pm on March 11, 2021.
